answers.answer: awww congrats to new mommy. very happy you and baby are fine.
Omg imagine if he was full term u wouldve prolly had a 10 pounder. Lol congrats on ur baby boy glad u guys are doing good.

question: Yesterday tuesday december 3rd 2013 i welcomed my baby boy into the world.......i was 20 days early but he is very healthy he was 8lbs 6ozs........i had him natural with the help of a epidural best thing ever created lol....i wasnt due until dec 23rd but i had preeclampsia so i had to be induced early which it turns out i was trying to go into labor on my own.......so glad its all over with now i am enjoying every second with him.....good luck ladies.........
title: hes here what a rocky road i had
